title: Ukraine president says he never met with Giuliani
text:
Zelensky on Tuesday insisted that he cannot be pressured by any foreign leader, attempting to dismiss the notion that Trump had strong-armed him regarding the Bidens.

“I’d like to tell you that I never feel pressure. I have lots of people who would like to put pressure on me here and abroad. But I'm the president of an independent Ukraine and I’d like to think and my actions suggest no one can put pressure on me,” Zelensky said.

A rough transcript of the phone call released last week by the White House revealed Zelensky had a personal assistant speak to Giuliani, and the Ukrainian president assured Trump that he hoped “very much that Mr. Giuliani will be able to travel to Ukraine and we will meet once he comes to Ukraine.”

Trump told Zelensky during the call that he would have Giuliani call him, according to the transcript.
